Hello again, I have tried several times to install the Kerbal Galaxy .02 AND .03 + kopernicus and cannot get the mod to work no matter what. I'm running 1.0.2. (i also installed 1.0.4)

Its either the game crashes, or the game works, but there's no extra solar systems or planets... but here's another problem....... After I gave up, I noticed that ALL of my orbiting satellites ships, stations, and debris are now GONE... I made sure to enable the display of all ship types at the top.. but they are all GONE

Any advice?
[https://www./folder/8vwgg50xv4g8f/SjÃƒÂ¥lkkÃƒÂ¥_PLANET](https://www./folder/8vwgg50xv4g8f/Sj%C3%83%C6%92%C3%82%C2%A5lkk%C3%83%C6%92%C3%82%C2%A5_PLANET) i made a planet for this mod
If somebody can make this mod compatible with OPM (perhaps by increasing Kerbol's SOI) and upload that to CKAN, I will try this mod with my fleet of heavily-modded starships.

It's compatible with OPM, you just go into the config in the OPM folder and reparent the planets to Kerbol instead of Sun. Although the orbit of the outermost planet nearly intersects that of the closest star. Which is crazy, because literally that star in KSP is legitimately light years away.

In the newest version, the Black Hole is gone again, I'm assuming this is because Kopernicus has some incompatibility with 1.0.4. I hope they fix the Kerbin reparenting issue soon, it really throws me off.

> 
> Hows it going? btw no need to add a lot of planets but you should add an absolute crap ton of stars, Planet formation may be common but most stars dont keep there planets (Usually thrown into the star or thrown out of the system) so to add the overwhelming sense of size that a galaxy has just add a tone of planetless stars with different colors, Plus i would reccomend you bundle my [intergalactic skybox](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109729-Daniels-Intergalactic-Skybox) into the pack since its most suited to a game where the galaxy has visitable stars. (Not to toot my own horn but it is the best skybox for this new environment.)

Sorry if im being persistent but please reply to my post.
